persName.roleName: Duke of Cumberland and King of Hanover

note.p: Death: Palace of Herrenhausen, Germany (18 November 1851)
Career: 1st Duke of Cumberland and Teviotdale, later King Ernest I of Hanover (1837-1851)
Freemason, initiated 11 May 1796, at occasional lodge held at house of Francis, 2nd Earl of Moira, later KG and Marquess of Hastings, Acting Grand Master
References: The Library and Museum of Freemasonry 'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows fo the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010, page 27-28
